metadataAttributes.Title: Professional Skills for the Workplace Specialization
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Improve Your Interpersonal Business Skills. Practice and master strategies that will improve your professional relationships and help you excel within an organization.
metadataAttributes.Skills: Emotional Intelligence, Adaptability, Problem Solving, Growth Strategies, Resiliency, Critical Thinking, Decision-Making, Brainstorming, Personal Advertisement, Planning, Resilience,
